title: Diff. eq. no context with slope field part - a

content.question: On the axes provided, sketch a slope field for the given differential equation at the twelve points indicated, and for -1<x<1, sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (0, -1) .

frqParts.text: On the axes provided, sketch a slope field for the given differential equation at the twelve points indicated, and for -1<x<1, sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (0, -1) .

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
